seo.title: My Values
seo.description: The Values I have according to my work

headline: My Personal Values
subheadline: The Values I have according to my work

coherence.title: Coherence
coherence.description: I want to actively maintain team cohesion. For me, this includes dealing positively with each other and clarifying differences on a professional level. In addition, I would also like to actively support my colleagues. Because in the end, it's the team's performance that counts for me.

diversity.title: Diversity
diversity.description: I stand against any kind of discrimination and hatred towards minorities as a counterpoint. I am also willing to learn something new every day and am reflective of my behavior here.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: My requirement is to be available to the employer as flexibly as possible. However, I also expect the same from an employer. So I offer to work overtime if necessary and an employer can provide me with a flexible work schedule with home office if possible.
